mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(order_id, receiver, user_id, address1, address2, address3, mobile, order_state, delivery_fee, use_point) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{receiver}, #{userId}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{mobile}, '배송준비', #{deliveryCost}, #{usePoint})
INSERT INTO order_items(order_id, product_id, product_count, price, save_point) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{productCount}, #{price}, #{savePoint})
mapper.select: SELECT order_id AS orderId, product_id AS productId, product_count AS productCount, price FROM order_items WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT order_id AS orderId, receiver, user_id AS userId, address1, address2, address3, mobile, order_state AS orderState, delivery_fee AS deliveryCost, use_point AS usePoint, order_date AS orderDate FROM orders WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
